name: StressMRI
title: Stress MRI
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with Stress MRI.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Stress MRI.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with Stress MRI are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Stress MRI are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)
